TEXT: An immortal being has wandered to the spire in search of something NL to stave off their boredom.
NL You let yourself burn freely...

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Please~ ~share~ ~your~ warmth~ ~with~ ~us."~
